SignIn.title: Sign in
SignIn.message_error_unknown: 오류가 발생했습니다. 나중에 다시 시도해 주세요.

SignUp.title: 가입하기
SignUp.message_success: Thanks for signing up! Please check your email for a verification link.
SignUp.message_error_required_login: Phone number and password are required.
SignUp.message_error_weak_password: Password is too weak. Please include at least one word character and at least one numeric. The password should be at least 8 characters.
SignUp.message_error_phone_exists: The phone number is already in use
SignUp.message_error_user_already_exists: The login info is already in use
SignUp.message_error_unknown: An error occurred. Please try again later.

ForgotPassword.title: Reset Password
ForgotPassword.message_success: Check your email for a link to reset your password.

ResetPassword.title: title
ResetPassword.description: Please enter your new password below.
ResetPassword.message_error_missing_required_fields: Password and confirm password are required
ResetPassword.message_error_same_password: Password is the same as the current password. Please choose another one.

CheckIn.title: Check in
CheckIn.message_error_already_checked_in: Check in failed: looks like you've already checked in
CheckIn.message_error_malformed_url: The URL that's being used is malformed
CheckIn.message_error_unknown: An error occurred. Please try again later.

SignUpSuccess.title: Thanks for signing up!
SignUpSuccess.description: Now you can go ahead and open your camera app, scan the QR code, and follow onscreen instructions.
